text: Amritsar West Assembly Constituency (Sl. No.: 16) is a Punjab Legislative Assembly constituency in Amritsar district, Punjab state, India. ==Member of Legislative Assembly== * 2012: Raj Kumar Verka, Indian National Congress * 2017: Raj Kumar Verka, Indian National Congress ==Election results== ===2017=== ==References== Category:Assembly constituencies of Punjab, India Category:Amritsar district
title: Amritsar West Assembly Constituency
